name: Smartphone
details: A high-end smartphone with 128GB storage, 6GB RAM, and a 12MP camera.

name: Laptop
details: A powerful laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and an Intel i7 processor.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
details: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 10-hour battery life and waterproof design.

name: Smartwatch
details: Fitness-focused smartwatch with heart rate monitoring and GPS tracking.

name: Gaming Console
details: Next-gen gaming console with 4K gaming and 1TB storage.

name: Wireless Earbuds
details: True wireless earbuds with noise cancellation and 20-hour battery life.

name: Tablet
details: 10-inch tablet with 64GB storage and stylus support.

name: 4K TV
details: 55-inch 4K UHD Smart TV with HDR and streaming apps built-in.

name: Digital Camera
details: Mirrorless digital camera with 24MP sensor and 4K video recording.

name: External Hard Drive
details: 2TB external hard drive with USB 3.0 connectivity.

name: Wireless Keyboard
details: Ergonomic wireless keyboard with backlit keys and long battery life.

name: Action Camera
details: Waterproof action camera with 4K recording and image stabilization.

name: Electric Toothbrush
details: Rechargeable electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes and a pressure sensor.

name: Portable Charger
details: 10,000mAh portable charger with fast charging capability and dual USB ports.

name: Coffee Maker
details: Programmable coffee maker with 12-cup capacity and built-in grinder.

name: Smart Thermostat
details: Smart thermostat with Wi-Fi connectivity and energy-saving features.

name: Fitness Tracker
details: Fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, sleep tracking, and step counter.

name: Robot Vacuum
details: Robot vacuum cleaner with mapping technology and automatic dirt disposal.

name: Electric Kettle
details: 1.7L electric kettle with temperature control and keep-warm function.

name: Air Purifier
details: Air purifier with HEPA filter, quiet operation, and smart sensors.
